attributes.action: Set-up proper 4/5 yr apprentiships within proper businesses for our young men and women.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a nation we are short of many manual skills.  I don't believe that you can learn to be a bricklayer or tiler in a few months. Too many of our young people can't cope with the 5 days a week in college.  In many cases thats why they didn't do very well in school, but they thrive in the working environment with day release.  Sadly there aren't enough apprentiships to go around.  So sadly, many fall by the way side, as they did at school.

As the army focus on those from lower income families for war fodder....  Let focus on all our young people to help them support our nations physical infrstructure.
